key.name: pool-capacity
key.description: Count of prebuilt and usable pellets. There will not be pool extension. Therefore, no spawning pellet when all of them are in use, unless any of them gets out of screen and recycled for next use. Changes on this requires restart to take effect.

key.name: spawn-timeout
key.summary: Time interval of each spawning timeout.
key.description: Time interval of each spawning timeout. For each spawning timeout, pellet spawning will occur in probability of spawn-probability.

key.name: spawn-probability
key.summary: Spawning probability of each spawning timeout
key.description: Spawning probability of each spawning timeout. 0 means no spawning, 1 means spawn pellet every timeout.

key.name: stepping-timeout
key.description: Time interval of each step animation. Every pellet moves in each stepping. It may be considered as 'frame duration'.

key.name: speed
key.description: A pair of pellet speed. The former is minimum speed, the latter is maximum speed. If this is invalid, this can be changed to be vaild.

key.name: offset
key.description: Offset of pellet plane. When offset is (0, 0), leftmost pellet will stick to left border of screen and Topmost pellet, top border of screen.

key.name: pellet-directions
key.description: Directions of pellets. Each direction must be one of 'UP', 'DOWN', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT'. Invalid values will be ignored.

key.name: proceed-timeout
key.description: This key will be renamed. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: speed-min
key.description: This key will not be used. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: speed-max
key.description: This value will not be used. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-colors
key.description: The colors which pellets will use. Each pellet will use one of the colors randomly. The format of color should be understood by gdk_rgba_parse(). ( For example, rgba( 127, 127, 127, 0.5 ) or #979797 )

key.name: pellet-default-alpha
key.description: This key will be relocated. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-trail-length
key.description: This key will be relocated. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-width
key.description: This key will be relocated. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-glow-radius
key.description: This key will be relocated. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-offset-x
key.description: This value will not be used. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: pellet-offset-y
key.description: This value will not be used. To have period to move to new keys, changes on this will be reflected on new correspond key, and vice versa.

key.name: colors
key.description: The colors which pellets will use. Each pellet will use one of the colors randomly. The format of color should be understood by gdk_rgba_parse(). ( For example, rgba( 127, 127, 127, 0.5 ) or #979797 )

key.name: default-alpha
key.description: Default Alpha which is used for colors without alpha value. For colors with their alpha values, they will use their own. 0 means transparent, 1 means opaque.

key.name: trail-length
key.description: Trail length of pellet.

key.name: width
key.description: Width of pellet.

key.name: glow-radius
key.description: Glowing radius of pellet.
